text: hey, with memberships can you restrict a downloadable asset? so let's say we've got a worksheet for someone can we make it so the link that actually has the asset can't be accessed unless you're a member?
This would definitely be a need for some enterprise clients we're talking with
I would assume no since when you open a PDF in browser (presumably after clikcing a CTA) it doens't load the HubSpot tracking code. So I don't think HubSpot would be able to control anything
If the document is hosted in the HubSpot file manager it could
Yeah, you can only restrict pages and blogs at the time. We're thinking about more nuanced controls for files in the future. cc <@U6MHBFW1K>
